ENS Content Resolver

This extensions resolves ENS domains (.eth) to IPFS hashes and redirects your browser to the content.

Try it out by entering e.g. monkybrain.eth in your browser's address bar.

It first tries to serve the content through your local IPFS gateway (localhost:8080). If you don't have a node running locally, it will use the public gateway (gateway.ipfs.io) instead.

Currently it only supports Infura for connecting to the Ethereum network. Support for local Ethereum nodes will hopefully arrive soon. As will support for Swarm.

If you like this project, please star it on Github. If you'd like to contribute, even better!

Feedback of any kind would be much appreciated (philip.prophet@gmail.com)

P.S. If you need help storing IPFS hashes with your ENS domain, I have written a service for that called ipfs-to-ens.

Version: 0.1
